deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@dev Authenticate a video and emit an event for the verification attempt.
 @param _cid The CID of the video to be verified.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (struct MediaAuthentication.Media memory[] memory)
tuple(bytes32[] storage ref,struct MediaAuthentication.Media memory[] memory)

authenticateMedia(string).details: Authenticate a video and emit an event for the verification attempt.

params._cid: The CID of the video to be verified.

getAllMediaDetails().details: Fetches all media details uploaded to the blockchain.

returns.details: Array of media details (CID, metadata, uploader, and timestamp).

uploadMedia(string,string).details: Uploads a new video and stores its hash and metadata on the blockchain.

params._cid: The CID of the video (IPFS hash or centralized server ID).
params._metadata: Metadata associated with the video (e.g., title, description).

verifyMedia(string).details: Verifies the authenticity of a video by comparing its hash with stored records.

params._cid: The CID of the video to be verified.

returns.isAuthentic: True if the video is authentic, false otherwise.
